pages.text: A specially prepared crafting area consists of a Grove Stone and a Grove Crafter. The Grove Stone itself must be activated using a sufficient $(l:spells/spell_grove_supplication)Supplication$() spell, and when activated it will draw in fay particles to itself.

Once activated, a Grove Stone can power any number of Grove Crafters within its radius. The crafter itself requires five ingredients to produce the desired result, and must be activated with the smallest sacrifice of blood using a $(l:apparatus/knives)Knife.$()
